instruction: Does the attestation contain material with URI 'oci://registry.access.redhat.com/ubi9/ubi-minimal' and commit '2f06ae0e6d3d9c4f610d32c480338eef474867f435d8d28625f2985e8acde6e8'?
Find when task 'build-image-index' finished
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_timestamp := timestamp if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "build-image-index"
    timestamp := task.finishedOn
}

Check the status of task 'init'

package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_status_check if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "init"
    task.status == "Succeeded"
}

instruction: Get the bundle reference for task 'show-sbom'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "show-sbom"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "show-sbom"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}

instruction: Find the bundle used by task 'prefetch-dependencies'
output_code:
package attestation_check

    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "prefetch-dependencies"

    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "prefetch-dependencies"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}
